task_description: Investigate GitHub Issue #5: Codex PR Fix #2 - Fetch actual Codex review from PR #4 to determine what needs fixing

patterns.github_cli_pattern: Use 'gh' CLI to fetch PR and review data - already installed at v2.75.1
patterns.investigation_flow: 1. Fetch PR #4 data, 2. Retrieve review ID 3633255069 comments, 3. Analyze commit 563ece1fbd, 4. Determine actionability
patterns.code_quality_pattern: Follow existing ESLint 9 flat config, React 19 patterns, Tailwind CSS v4 conventions

existing_implementations.description: React 19.2.0 SPA with TypeScript 5.9.3, Vite 7.2.4, Tailwind CSS 4.1.18, ESLint 9
